name: MeadowBound
description:
---NOTE----

The WebGL version works for the first two levels and will let you get a good idea for the game, however we highly recommend downloading the zip file and playing it locally, especially if you want to see the ending.

(for some reason the webgl doesn't handle collisions well and some key components of the game fall through the map)

A short fun story/puzzle game, get ready for the twist. Me and  my brother really put a lot of heart in this game and are so happy to have had the opportunity to participate. Can't wait to hear what everyone thinks!   Download for a much smoother experience!

****HINTS****

Don't look if you want to beat the game by yourself!

Level 1: Destroy the monument in Hellstein mode.

Level 2: Destroy the boulder in the center of the map while in Hellstein mode, pick up the broken rock pieces and put them in the pulley system.

Level 3: Fill the furnace with lava then tank with water (have the bucket filled with water before Hellstein mode).

Level 4: Kill the demon king and fly away.
